str.notes: For a left to right language (like English), keep this value as "left". For a right to left language, set this value to "right"
For a left to right language (like English), keep this value as "right". For a right to left language, set this value to "left"
allows truncating cell contents when displayed in a grid, and displaying the full text in a tooltip
Used widely to display dates. Possible values: any PHP date format. See http://php.net/manual/en/function.date.php for other options
Possible values: any PHP date format. See http://php.net/manual/en/function.date.php for other options
Possible values: any PHP date format. See http://php.net/manual/en/function.date.php for other options
Possible values: any PHP numeric-only date format. See http://php.net/manual/en/function.date.php for other options
Used when exporting files to Open Office Calc. Must be DMY (day, month, year) or MDY (month, day, year)
Possible values: any PHP numeric-only time format (allowing AM, PM). See http://php.net/manual/en/function.date.php for other options
imposes a maximum length in characters for the date part in the date picker
imposes a maximum length in characters for the time part in the date picker
1 - sunday, 2 - monday, etc. For a different first day of the week must also change the below settings accordingly
For a different first day of the week must also change the above DATE_PICKER_FIRST_DAY_OF_WEEK setting accordingly
This setting has to be set according to what was set in DATE_PICKER_DAY1 and DATE_PICKER_FIRST_DAY_OF_WEEK
This setting has to be set according to what was set in DATE_PICKER_DAY1 and DATE_PICKER_FIRST_DAY_OF_WEEK
This setting has to be set according to what was set in DATE_PICKER_DAY1 and DATE_PICKER_FIRST_DAY_OF_WEEK
This setting has to be set according to what was set in DATE_PICKER_DAY1 and DATE_PICKER_FIRST_DAY_OF_WEEK

This setting has to be set according to what was set in DATE_PICKER_DAY1 and DATE_PICKER_FIRST_DAY_OF_WEEK

str.notes: param: entered login name

str.value: User name is already taken. Please choose another one.
As of now you do not have a balanace associated with your newly created login credentials.
Without a balance, you will not be able to make orders.
If you do have a balance in %s, we'll probaly update it within %d hours. If that doesn't happen,
str.notes: 1st param: COOPERATIVE_NAME in this file
2nd param: HOURS_TO_UPDATE_BALANCE_FOR_NEW_MEMBER in settings.php minus elapsed hours from joining

str.value: To update your balance contact us at %s
str.notes: param : COOP_ADDRESS_MEMBER_BALANCE in settings.php

str.value: Your account has no permissions at all. If this is a mistake, please contact us at %s to correct the problem
str.notes: param : COOP_ADDRESS_MEMBER_PERMISSIONS in settings.php

str.value: Your account is inactive. If this is a mistake, please contact us at %s to correct the problem
str.notes: param : COOP_ADDRESS_MEMBER_PERMISSIONS in settings.php

str.note: copy coop order column title. can be empty
appears on every row coordination can be set for

str.value: Record was not saved. You may not have sufficent permissions or an error has occured.
To add more coordinators, please assign the relevant members coordinating permissions for the permission area
The selected group cannot be set as the coordinating group because some of its members are not authorized to coordinate %1$s. Those unauthorized members are: %2$s
str.notes: param1: record name, such as the producer name
param2: list of the unauthorized members

str.value: Some of the group members are no longer authorized to coordinate %1$s. Those unauthorized members are: %2$s
str.notes: param1: record name, such as the producer name
param2: list of the unauthorized members

str.value: Some of the group members are no longer authorized to coordinate it and were removed. Those unauthorized members are: %s
str.notes: param1: list of the unauthorized members

str.value: All members left in the group are no longer authorized: %s
Cannot remove own coordination permissions, only share it with others.
Join Items to Cost-Saving Larger Product
Package size for a large package that the cooperative allows ordering portions/slices of.
A number representing the sorting order of the product wherever a products list is displayed. Smaller numbers display higher on the list.
An index that indicates how much this product "burdens" a delivery. Helps to uphold a cooperative order's Delivery Capacity, if set
Max. product quantity for the entire coop order
Interval between orderable weights/capacities. Irrelevant for products provided by item quantity
This is the default price for the product. The actual product price can be set to a different value in each cooperative order
%s cannot have a negative value or zero
Product Unit must be set to Items when a Join To Product is defied

The maximum capacity of the pickup location in terms of the product field "Burden". the sum for all products of "Burden" times product quantity will be compared to this value for all the members' orders that have this pickup location selected. This is only a default value and can be overwritten in the cooperative order's pickup location settings. If not overridden in the coop order, members will not be able to place an order that exceeds the limitation set here.
The sum total of each ordered product "Burden" multiplied by the times it was ordered
The sum total of each ordered product "Burden" multiplied by the times it was ordered, per pickup location

Limits the size of this cooperative order's pickup location to the overall capacity, comapring it to the sum of the "burden" field of each product multiplied by the quantity ordered. Members will not be able to place an order that exceeds the limitation set here.

Limits the size of this cooperative order's producer to the overall capacity, comapring it to the sum of the "burden" field of each product multiplied by the quantity ordered. Members will not be able to place an order that exceeds the limitation set here.
The sum total of each ordered product "Burden" multiplied by the times it was ordered, per producer
Setting this value will override each member's payment method for the current cooperative order

Limits the size of this cooperative order to the overall order's capacity, comapring it to the sum of the "burden" field of each product multiplied by the quantity ordered. A limitation can also be set for a specific pickup location. Members will not be able to place an order that exceeds the limitation set here.
Limits the total amount of the cooperative order. Members will not be able to place an order that exceeds the limitation set here.
A fixed amount that is paid by each member per order, in addition to the sum cost of the products, to cover expenses
Defines a small member's order, that has a reduced cooperative fee attached to it
A reduced cooperative fee, for a small order
Defines a cooperative fee by percents from the total amount paid for ordered products
%s cannot be changed to the selected value.
%1$s must be set when %2$s is set.
%1$s must be later then or identical to %2$s
Please confirm or cancel the delete operation
This operation will delete as well all the orders that may have been made for this product. Please confirm
Cooperative order cannot be updated at its current status
No pickup locations to select. It may be that there are no records in the system that are not already defined in the current cooperative order or that you do not have sufficient permissions.
There are no producer records to add.
There are no product records that are not already defined.
There are no producers in the current cooperative order. Please add some producers.
This order cannot be modified because its cooperative order is not active.
This order cannot be modified due to its date range limitations.
Cannot create a new order because the cooperative order is in full capacity.
The reason for the full capacity is that the field Total Burden has reached or exeeded the value of Delivery Capacity in the cooperative order.
The reason for the full capacity is that the field Total Coop has reached or exeeded the value of Max. Coop Total‏ in the cooperative order.
This order cannot be enlarged beyond the full capacity of the cooperative order.
str.explanation: this message appears both when opening an order that cannot be enlarged and when trying to enlarge an order that can be enlarged to some extent - but beyond that extent

str.value: This order cannot be enlarged beyond the full capacity of the cooperative order's pickup location.
str.explanation: this message can appear both when changing a pickup location and when updating order items

str.value: The cooperative order's pickup location field Total Burden has exeeded the value of the pickup location's Delivery Capacity.
The cooperative order's pickup location field Total Coop has exeeded the value of the pickup location's Max. Coop Total‏.
This order cannot be enlarged beyond the full capacity of the cooperative order's producer %s.
The field Total Burden for the cooperative order's producer %s has exeeded the value of the producer's Delivery Capacity.
The field Total Coop for the cooperative order's producer %s has exeeded the value of the producer's Max. Prodcuer Order.
Order cannot be enlarged beyond a total products of %s
There are no members left to add to this cooperative order. All members are already ordering.

The maximum quantity the cooperative order coordinator will be allowed to *add* to your order for completing partial orders to the package size. For instance, if a package size is 2lb, and you wish to order only 0.5lb, by entering 0.5lb in this field you may specify that you are ready to go up to 1lb.
Cannot save a value in the "Add" column without an order.
Cannot save a comment without an order. Such comments should be left in the Order Header
Products order is invalid. Detailed message appears above each row in red color.
Quantity entered exceeds the maximum order per member for this product
Quantity entered causes the entire cooperative to exceed the maximum order for this product
Quantity entered is not valid. Must enter values in multiples of %s
Cannot remove order for this product at this time, because quantities were joined to a cost-saving larger package. Please contact the cooperative order coordinator for help
Cannot reduce quantities for this product at this time, because quantities were joined to a cost-saving larger package. Please contact the cooperative order coordinator for help
It seems you have made changes and did not save them. If you proceed in changing the products view mode, these changes will be lost. Proceed?
Some order items' quantities have been modified by a coordinator. The modified rows are marked in color and the original quantities are displayed in parenthesis
All partial orders add up to a complete cooperative order.
E-mails of Specific Products' Ordering Members
Lock Cooperative Order by Setting Closing Date to Now
Join products that the field Join to Product is defined for them, to save costs by ordering larger packages
Rollback join products operation to allow reducing quantities for them
Attention: Even after setting quantities as suggested, product quantities won't add up to producer-required multiples

The cooperative order is still open for changes, according to its dates. At this stage it is not recommended to join products, as this action will lock reducing quantities for the products that were joined, and there may be a need to run it again, if quantities have increased. Proceed?
Products items were joined successfully into larger cost-saving packages. The following orders, marked in color, were modified.
Products items were unjoined successfully into smaller more costly packages. The following orders, marked in color, were modified.
%1$d items were joined to the product %2$s. As a result a sum of %3$s was saved.
There are already orders against this producer in this cooperative orders. Producer cannot be deleted in such a case. Specific products can be deleted though.
There are already orders against this product in this cooperative orders. Prices cannot be changed in such a case. All orders must be removed from the product first.
There are already orders against this product in this cooperative orders. Product cannot be deleted in such a case. All orders must be removed from the product first.
This product's quantity was joined by at least part of a linked product's quantity
At least part of this product's quantity was joined to a linked product's quantity
The percentage in which a member's order can exceed hir balance. This rule is being applied only when the member's payment method allows a percentage over balance.
Verify Password does not contain the same value as New Password
Please confirm the delete operation. Note that this action will succeed only when there are no orders linked to the member. To block a member from signing in, remove hir permissions instead.
Cannot delete your own member record.
Cannot remove your own system admin role.
Cannot modify a system admin record when you are not one
There are no existing roles to this member
This member has all existing roles. There are no roles to add
Supported formats: jpg, gif, png. Max. size: %sKB

When uploading this field is not mandatory and the system can set it automatically. It is included in cases when you do not have permissions to upload files and want to correlate products with already uploaded image files. Image files must then be uploaded to the upload directory: %s
It seems that the reason is a bug in the software
The maximum size of %dKb was exceeded
The file type or size is not supported.
There seems to be a permission error when uploading to this site.
There seems to be a permission or configuration error when uploading to this site: a temporary destination folder is not found.
The file was uploaded, but its move to the site's uploads folder failed, probably due to a site permission error.

This sum refers to the delivery costs to all pickup locations in the current cooperative order for each producer

HomeCoop is a tiny local consumer cooperatives web ordering system.

Time should be in the format: %s
Attention: you have chosen to move this order from one member to another. To complete the operation confirm this message box and save the order
The login name entered is already in use
The member name entered is already in use
The first email address entered is already in use as another member's first email address
There was an error in verifying the login details against the database, possibly due to overload
A pickup location must include at least one storage area.
Storage area #%s: name is required when the storage area is not marked for deletion.
%s is associated with the following ordered products and cannot be deactivated: %s
%s is associated with the following products - these products will not appear in the order page unless associated with an active storage area: %s
A pickup location must include one default storage area.
The storage area within each pickup location that this product is designated to.
There are ordered items on the pickup location %s, so it cannot be deactivated.

The maximum capacity of the storage area in terms of the product field "Burden". The sum for all products of "Burden" times product quantity will be compared to this value for all the orders of products designated to this storage area. This is only a default value and can be overwritten in the cooperative order's storage area settings.
The pickup location you have chosen does not store some of the ordered products.
The pickup location you have chosen does not have enough free storage area for some of the ordered products.
The sum total of each ordered product "Burden" multiplied by the times it was ordered, per storage area.
Cannot save the requested order since %s has not enough free storage area.
Cannot change the product's storage area for %s since there is not enough available space in the selected storage area
The preferred file format for data exports.
